noun.description: A fossil articulate brachiopod of the genus Orthis, family Orthidae, or order Orthida, of the Palaeozoic era.

adjective.description: Of or relating to the family Orthidae or order Orthida of fossil brachiopods.

origin: Mid 19th century; earliest use found in Smithsonian Institution Annual Reports. From scientific Latin Orthidae, family name from Orthis, genus name + -idae.
